product_name: The North Face Mezzaluna Hoodie - Women's
long_description: With ruched sides, The North Face Mezzaluna hoodie offers a new twist on a classic fleece jacket. It's made from super soft, lightweight micro fleece that breathes, wicks moisture and dries fast. Polartec(R) Classic 100 Micro fleece features natural stretch and resists pilling. Drawcord hood; 2 open hand pockets.
short_description: With ruched sides, The North Face Mezzaluna hoodie offers a new twist on a classic fleece jacket. It's made from super soft, lightweight micro fleece that breathes, wicks moisture and dries fast.
